title: Region Transfers
body:
YodaWithdaHodas
Aug 27, 1:51 PM PDT

I am currently Active Duty military, I've been playing League of Legends for years, I support both the professional side and the community side of game play. I watch almost every single professional game, from NA LCS to LCK and LPL. I support several streamers. I've spent thousands of dollars on League of Legends ( I even have a $2,000) dollar Thresh Tattoo! Haha, my point is I've been stationed all over the world and have had to transfer servers because of this, it eventually adds up. In just 4 years I've been stationed in Japan, Turkey and now back to NA. Don't get me wrong, I will pay because I LOVE League but I think it would be a super awesome thing if RIOT would waive the transfer fee for Active Duty Military members due to the moves we undergo to meet Mission demands. Just a thought!

replies.body:
This is a constructive and thoughtful suggestion, and I totally dig the idea.  Something like this would likely be developed by another team, but I'll forward your suggestion to interested parties.  I can't offer any updates or follow-ups on this, but it's appreciated and will be fielded to the right team!  

For now, feel free to reach out to us in a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our support team can look at specific cases like this individually and find options best fit for the situation.
